item.title: Samsung Galaxy S III Supports Verizon 4G LTE
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S III for Verizon Wireless is a top-of-the-line smartphone with cutting-edge technology for both features and speed. This model continues the Galaxy series’ tradition of innovation. This Android smartphone uses the Google Operating System 4.0 “Ice Cream Sandwich” and features a 4.8-inch HD Super AMOLED display. With 1280 x 720 pixels, the screen displays sharp, vibrant images and text. The curved design helps prevent scratches, even when the phone is face down.
